name: part_001
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】豪華ゲスト & 生演奏 & 告知あり！ #博衣こより生誕Live2025 -FIRST STEP- 【博衣こより⧸ホロライブ】 [ERIxQaoEbXs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Opening montage with music and visual effects featuring various characters and song titles.
Hakui Koyori performs the song 'WAO!!' live on stage.
Hakui Koyori greets the audience and makes announcements about her birthday and album release.

subtitles.original: HAKUI KOYORI
subtitles.english: HAKUI KOYORI

subtitles.original: BIRTHDAY LIVE
subtitles.english: BIRTHDAY LIVE

subtitles.original:
FIRST STEP
博衣こより生誕Live 2025
subtitles.english:
FIRST STEP
Hakui Koyori Birthday Live 2025

subtitles.original: もう キミの心 ちくっとしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Now, I'll give your heart a little prick.

subtitles.original: WAO!!
subtitles.english: WAO!!

subtitles.original: 博衣こより生誕祭！
subtitles.english: Hakui Koyori's Birthday Celebration!

subtitles.original: 1stアルバム発売記念ライブ！
subtitles.english: 1st Album Release Commemoration Live!

subtitles.original: いっぱい盛り上がってこー！
subtitles.english: Let's get super hyped!

subtitles.original: 絶対無理を むちゃしたって だって 不安になるし
subtitles.english: Doing the impossible, overdoing it... it makes me anxious.

subtitles.original: 全然嘘つけないし だって どこまでも 真っ直ぐだし
subtitles.english: I can't lie at all, because I'm straightforward to a fault.

subtitles.original: まさかキラキラもきっと僕次第だ
subtitles.english: The sparkle must depend on me too.

subtitles.original: But don't give up なんて言わないんだから
subtitles.english: I won't say 'don't give up' or anything.

subtitles.original: じっとしてらんないし だって 動いちゃうし
subtitles.english: I can't stay still, because I just have to move.

subtitles.original: ワン、ツー、ステップ ちょっとずつ進めば
subtitles.english: One, two, step, if I move forward bit by bit...

subtitles.original: 夢の指揮 溶けちゃうな
subtitles.english: The boundaries of my dreams will melt away.

subtitles.original: なりたい僕を 君が好きな僕を
subtitles.english: The 'me' I want to be, the 'me' you like...

subtitles.original: ちゃんと余りなく見せたいな
subtitles.english: I want to show it all to you without holding back.

subtitles.original: あっちゃっちゃ びっくりするほどできもんじゃん
subtitles.english: Oh boy, I can do it surprisingly well!

subtitles.original: 間違って悩んだりバカじゃん
subtitles.english: Making mistakes and worrying? That's silly!

subtitles.original: けど君に見つけてほしくて
subtitles.english: But I want you to find me.

subtitles.original: 僕は迎えに行くんだ だったらハッピー
subtitles.english: So I'm coming to get you! That would be happy!

subtitles.original: WAO!! WAO!! 叩け 手を
subtitles.english: WAO!! WAO!! Clap your hands!

subtitles.original: 泣いて 笑って 愛して しっぽ振って
subtitles.english: Cry, laugh, love, and wag your tail!

subtitles.original: WAO!! WAO!! 叩け 手を
subtitles.english: WAO!! WAO!! Clap your hands!

subtitles.original: ダメな僕ごと覚えておいて
subtitles.english: Remember me, even the bad parts.

subtitles.original: もー キミの心 ちくっとしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Now, I'll give your heart a little prick.

subtitles.original: もー どうしようとか たまに思っちゃって沈んだり
subtitles.english: Sometimes I wonder 'what should I do' and feel down.

subtitles.original: 案外いけるかも？ふわり 歌っちゃって また「どうも！」
subtitles.english: Maybe I can actually do it? I sing lightly and say 'hello' again!

subtitles.original: っぱり 読み切れない お座り 夢だっけ？
subtitles.english: As expected, I can't quite figure it out. Was 'sit' just a dream?

subtitles.original: うっかり 止められない また歩いて棒に当たるな
subtitles.english: I carelessly can't stop, and I'll walk into a stick again.

subtitles.original: ワン、ツー、ステップ 死んだフリしてるの？
subtitles.english: One, two, step, are you playing dead?

subtitles.original: やめて はい こっちおいで
subtitles.english: Stop that, okay, come over here!

subtitles.original: 欲しがる君と あげすぎな僕とで
subtitles.english: With the 'you' who wants, and the 'me' who gives too much...

subtitles.original: もっといける気がしています
subtitles.english: I feel like we can go even further.

subtitles.original: あっちゃっちゃ びっくりするほどできもんじゃん
subtitles.english: Oh boy, I can do it surprisingly well!

subtitles.original: 間違って悩んだりバカじゃん
subtitles.english: Making mistakes and worrying? That's silly!

subtitles.original: けど君に見つけてほしくて
subtitles.english: But I want you to find me.

subtitles.original: 僕は迎えに行くんだ だったらハッピー
subtitles.english: So I'm coming to get you! That would be happy!

subtitles.original: だって やっぱり 一人じゃダメだけど
subtitles.english: Because, as expected, I'm no good on my own.

subtitles.original: 集まって バカして わっちゃえば
subtitles.english: But if we gather, act silly, and make some noise...

subtitles.original: ほら いつでも言える「おかえり！」
subtitles.english: Look, I can say 'welcome back' anytime!

subtitles.original: 僕は見せたいんだ 大いなるハッピー
subtitles.english: I want to show you a great big 'happy'!

subtitles.original: WAO!! WAO!! 叩け 手を
subtitles.english: WAO!! WAO!! Clap your hands!

subtitles.original: 泣いて 笑って 愛して しっぽ振って
subtitles.english: Cry, laugh, love, and wag your tail!

subtitles.original: WAO!! WAO!! 叩け 手を
subtitles.english: WAO!! WAO!! Clap your hands!

subtitles.original: ダメな僕ごと覚えておいて
subtitles.english: Remember me, even the bad parts.

subtitles.original: まさかキラキラもきっと僕次第だ
subtitles.english: The sparkle must depend on me too.

subtitles.original: But don't give up なんて言わないんだから
subtitles.english: I won't say 'don't give up' or anything.

subtitles.original: 刮目狙って ぶちかまし次第だ
subtitles.english: I'll aim for your attention and give it my all!

subtitles.original: はぐれずに希望へ 大爆走！
subtitles.english: Galloping towards hope without getting lost!

subtitles.original: 君の心 ちくっとしちゃっていいじゃん ハッピーじゃん
subtitles.english: It's okay if I prick your heart, isn't it? It's happy!

subtitles.original: へへ、みんな、こんこよー！
subtitles.english: Hehe, everyone, Kon-koyo!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ6期生、秘密結社holoXの頭脳、博衣こよりだよー！
subtitles.english: I'm the brains of Hololive Gen 6, Secret Society holoX, Hakui Koyori!

subtitles.original: すごい躍っちゃった！
subtitles.english: I danced so much!

subtitles.original: ということで、みんな、こんこよー！
subtitles.english: So, everyone, Kon-koyo!

subtitles.original: 博衣こより生誕ライブ2025にお越しくださいまして、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming to Hakui Koyori Birthday Live 2025!

subtitles.original: ということで、ここでみんなにめでたいことを2つ、お知らせさせていただきます！
subtitles.english: So, I have two happy announcements for everyone!

subtitles.original: まずは、博衣こより、誕生日を迎えましたー！
subtitles.english: First, Hakui Koyori has reached her birthday!

subtitles.original: わーい！わーい！わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: や、めでたく無事に迎えることができました。
subtitles.english: I was able to celebrate it safely.

subtitles.original: みんな待っててくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for waiting.

subtitles.original: そして、2つ目は、ファーストアルバムが発売になりましたー！
subtitles.english: And the second one is, my first album has been released!

subtitles.original: わーい！わーい！わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay! Yay!
